vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξαπορέω,
strengthened for ἀπορέω, to be in great doubt or difficulty, [Refs 4th c.BC+]:—middle, ἀπορούμενοι, ἀλλ᾽ οὐκ ἐ. [NT]: so in aorist passive ἐξηπορήθην [LXX+1st c.BC+]; ἐξαπορηθῆναι ἀργυρίον to be without money, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (middle) to despair; (passive) to be in despair
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(middle) to despair; (passive) to be in despair
some list as a deponent ἐξαπορέομαι, pas., to be in the utmost perplexity or despair, 2Cor. 1:8; 4:8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 落入艱困, 疑惑, 窘迫的情況 (林後 1:8, 4:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 落入艰困, 疑惑, 窘迫的情况 (林后 1:8, 4:8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ngã lòng; tuyệt vọng. ἐκ (G1537) + ἀπορέω (G639)
